meta.name: Te Reo
meta.description: Te Reo is New Zealand's dedicated Māori-language television channel, celebrating and preserving Te Reo Māori through immersive programming. Broadcasting entirely in the Māori language, the channel offers a range of content, including news, educational shows, cultural storytelling, and entertainment, all designed to promote fluency and connection to Māori traditions. Te Reo plays a vital role in revitalizing and normalizing the Māori language, providing an essential platform for cultural expression and identity in Aotearoa.
